body.name: Dash Camera for Cars, 1080P FHD Dash Cam Front, Car Camera Dashcam with WiFi APP Control, Loop Recording, G-Sensor, Night Vision, 24H Parking Mode, Support 128GB SD Card Max (Not Included
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【1080P Front Dash Cam】This Diamond Lark dash camera for cars is equipped with a 1080P front camera, which can capture the unexpected events in the process of driving, making your journey safer and more comfortable

【Built in WiFi】This wireless dash cam doesn't have a screen, but you can connect to the car dash cam via an APP to access the settings. You can download the APP from the Apple Store or Google Store(APP name ”Viidure”)

【Seamless Loop Recording】After the loop recording function of the dashcam is enabled, the new video will overwrite the old one when the memory of the memory card is insufficient, so as to avoid stopping the video recording due to insufficient storage. There are three options for the recording length of a single video: 1 minute/3 minutes/5 minutes
【G-Sensor】When G-Sensor is enabled, the dashboard camera can automatically detect sudden vibrations or collisions in the car and lock the video being recorded to prevent it from being overwritten

【24H Parking Monitor】The car camera has 24-hour parking monitoring function, but it needs to be connected with the driving recorder hardwire kit. Please note that this part is not included in this product and you need to purchase it separately

【Warranty and After-sales Service】The product warranty is free for 12 months (from the time you receive the product). If there is a non-human fault during this usage period, please contact our after-sales service in time. After verifying the product failure, we will replace it for you free of charge
body.description: Warm Tips 1. This product does not come with a memory card, you need to purchase it separately. 2. The built-in battery of the dashboard camera can only be used to save and sync time, and cannot be used to power the dashcam for video recording. 3. After inserting the memory card into the dash cam and powering it on for the first time, the dash camera will prompt you to format the memory card with a voice prompt. At this time, you only need to briefly press the power button to complete the formatting. You can also format the memory card in the settings of the Viidure app( WiFi Password: 12345678 )

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Diamond Lark 1080P FHD Front Dash Camera Creates a Safe Driving Environment for You Diamond Lark LF-D306 dash camera for cars is a fully-featured front dash cam that comes with a range of functions, including 1080P high-definition recording, wireless control via a mobile phone app, loop recording, G-sensor collision protection, 24-hour parking monitoring, 170-degree wide-angle shooting, and more. It is easy to install and use, and can help you record the situation during driving and protect your driving safety.

Warm Tips 1. This product does not come with a memory card, you need to purchase it separately. 2. The built-in battery of the dashboard camera can only be used to save and sync time, and cannot be used to power the dashcam for video recording. 3. After inserting the memory card into the dash cam and powering it on for the first time, the dash camera will prompt you to format the memory card with a voice prompt. At this time, you only need to briefly press the power button to complete the formatting. You can also format the memory card in the settings of the Viidure app( WiFi Password: 12345678 ) Packing List 1 * 1080P Front Dash Camera 1 * Car Charger（11.5FT） 1 * Adhesive Sticker 1 * User Manual 1 * Installation Tool

When you enable the loop recording function of the car camera, the device can automatically overwrite the earliest recorded video when the storage card is full, in order to continuously record the latest driving data. The front car camera is equipped with G-sensor that can detect collisions or other unexpected events, and protect the relevant recorded videos from being overwritten. This can help you better protect important driving data, so that you can view and use it when necessary. When the vehicle is in the parked and turned off state, the car dash cam can continuously monitor the surroundings of the vehicle and automatically trigger video recording when a collision or other abnormal event is detected. (Note: you need to purchase a separate hardware kit to implement this function)

The 170° wide-angle lens and 1080P resolution of the car camera can capture a broader and clear view, which means that you can record the driving process more comprehensively and have a better understanding of the road and surrounding environment. This can provide more information and details when you need to view and use recorded data, helping you better understand what happened. The drive recorder is equipped with a voice recording function, which can help you better understand what happened during the driving process by recording voices and audio. It can also serve as evidence in accident handling, insurance claims, and other aspects. The car charger of the dash camera comes with 2 USB ports, which allows you to charge multiple devices simultaneously while driving. This feature is especially useful for families or friends who may need to charge their phones, tablets, or other devices.

Q: What is the length of the car charger cable for the dashcam? A: The length of the car security camera's car charger cable is 11.5 inches. Q: Can the car cam only be operated through a mobile app? Where can the mobile app be downloaded from? A: Yes, for instance, to set up the dashcam's functions, or to view or download videos, you can only operate it through the mobile app. You can search for "Viidure" in the Google Play Store or Apple Store and download it. Q: What is the maximum storage capacity supported by this dashboard camera? A: The maximum storage supported is 128GB. This driving recorder does not come with a memory card, you need to purchase it separately. Please note that when purchasing a memory card, you must buy a storage card that meets the CLASS10 or higher specification. Q: Can the 24-hour parking monitoring of the cam recorder be used directly? A: No, the 24-hour parking monitoring of the dash camera cannot be used directly. You need to purchase a separate hardware kit to use this function. Q: Does the dashcam automatically turn on when connected to the car charger via the cigarette lighter after the car starts? A: Yes, the driving recorder will automatically turn on and start recording video when it receives power. Q: Can the volume of the voice prompts of the dashcam be adjusted? A: Yes, you can adjust the volume of the voice prompts by connecting the dashcam to Wi-Fi and adjusting the settings in the mobile app. Q: What is the initial password for connecting my phone to car's WiFi? A: The initial password for the WiFi is 12345678, and you can set a new password in the background after logging into the app.

LF-D306 LF-D108 LF-D203 LF-D100 Camera Type Front Front Front + Rear 14.7FT Dash Cam Hardwire Kit Video Resolution 1080P FHD 1080P FHD 1080P + 720P Type-C Port（12V- 24V to 5V） Lens Angle 170° 170° 170°+140° Low Voltage Protection Function Screen Size ✘ 3.0 Inch 3.0 Inch 24H Time-Lapse Parking Monitor Wi-Fi(APP Control) ✓ ✘ ✘ ✘ SD Card Included ✘ 32GB SD Card 32GB SD Card ✘ Storage 128G Max 64G Max 128G Max ✘ Mounting Type Adhesive Mount Suction Mount+Adhesive Mount Suction Mount+Adhesive Mount ✘ Video File Format TS AVI MOV ✘

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera, highly recommended!
reviews.reviewText: Got two at less than $20 each for wife and daughter. Installation is very easy with double sided tape; setup straight forward with the app. The camera connects to your cell phone via WiFi reliably and video loops are stored on micro USB (not included). Unbeatable at this price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and get up and running
reviews.reviewText: I used this dash camera most of the summer in a Nevada high desert area and was impressed with the results. First, it stayed securely stuck to the windshield in spite of being exposed to some extreme temperatures while parked in the desert during very hot days. I’ve experienced adhesive melting and camera coming loose with a previous camera. Also, it was very easy to download the phone app and get the camera paired and running in little time. Processing the video files for editing or adding to a movie clip are easy and straightforward. One negative observation that I haven’t been able to figure out is that occasionally the video will have a slight “flicker” from light to dark during playback. It doesn’t happen often and it’s not that much of an issue to me, but it’s the reason for only 4 stars. Overall I consider this camera to be a decent value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works just as expected. No surprises, good or bad. Be patient with the app. It provides all the basic functionality which is what I wanted.Make sure you buy a compatible Micro SD card (Class 10). Clean the spot and slick the cam in first attempt. I tucked-in the wire after ensuring the cam works fine, it wasn't as difficult as I thought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok I guess , but has its imperfections
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install , and works. It does take atleast a minute to hook up in up but app is easy to use and the cam starts recording everytime you start your car .The issues are that a high speed SD card is required for it to work properly and quickly . I had a spare SD card but not high speed enough for this cam and now an annoying voice reminds me every so often to use a high speed SD card . A nice feature that it tells you what's wrong but a regular Joe SD card is not recommended . Also while it does support 24 hour parking mode , you need to buy a hard wire kit to even use this feature as a hard wire kit is not included and the cable that is included only works when car is on .So make sure you have a good SD card and a hardwire kit for the 24 hour parking mode feature . Other than that a solid camera . Works good even at nightThey should include an option to include a hard wire kit at check out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for the price you pay
reviews.reviewText: I like it was affordable and it has decent quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: camera quality is pretty clear, haven't had any issues where i really needed it but it works perfect for what it is!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I highly recommend to anyone driving.
reviews.reviewText: This dash cam is small and simple. We’ve been using it in our daughter’s vehicle. It takes very clear video/pictures and has the feature you need to protect yourself during an auto accident. We’ve been using a 32gb SD card which hold many hours of driving. The camera looks great and is light weight so it is less likely to fall from it’s pedestal if bumped. I highly recommend to anyone driving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Must be plugged into a 12 V outlet or cigarette lighter
reviews.reviewText: This camera is nice to have to record other drivers driving horribly. It is small enough that it is indiscreet and is out of the way on the windshield. The cord is long enough for you to sneak it around the edge of the window and not hanging down in your field of view.The major drawback is that this is hardwired into a 12 volt lighter plug-in. Unfortunately, mu cars have USB plugs not 12 V/cigarette lighters. In my car my only 12 V plug in the driving cabin is in the center consul between the front seats. That leaves this camera, for me, not practical. It would be better if they created this with a USB end.I did receive this item for free. However, this is my fair and honest review.
